- The world's fastest encrypted texting & file transferring
- Smooth voice & video calls even with poor devices
- Military-grade encryption with End-To-End cryptographic protocols
- No personal data collection, all data is stored ONLY on user devices
- Never worry about crowded Wifi or slow internet, even with 2G/ EDGE, noisy Wi-Fi, and Satellite networks.
- Switch on Low Data Usage mode from the app settings and consume 6X less data for voice calls than you would with other messengers
- Simple UI/UX without overloaded settings
- No ads, No notifications

- Sign-up without email: we have removed email from sign-up requirements. The system will assign a virtual number automatically without any verification process and will let you setup your password.
- Audio-conferencing for up to 1000 attendees. Crystal clear voice quality even in low-data mode
- Video call quality enhancements. Now video works much smoother in low bandwidth networks
- Picture in Picture mode for video calls supported on Android 8+
- Contacts architecture enhancement
